briefdescription.para: Whether the string action is in search mode.
Whether the string can be cleared by clicking the trailing action.
Get widget representation of the string action.

parameterdescription.para: Widget flags for the configuration of the widget (type)

briefdescription.para: Connect this action to a public action.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to public action to connect to
Whether to also connect descendant child actions

briefdescription.para: Disconnect this action from its public action.

parameterdescription.para: Whether to also disconnect descendant child actions

simplesect.para: Reference to action at leading position
Reference to action at trailing position

briefdescription.para: Get search mode (if on, there will be a leading action with a search icon and a trailing action to clear the string)
Set search mode (if on, there will be a leading action with a search icon and a trailing action to clear the string)
Get whether the string can be cleared by clicking the trailing action.

simplesect.para: Boolean indicating whether the string can be cleared

briefdescription.para: Set whether the string can be cleared by clicking the trailing action.

parameterdescription.para: Boolean indicating whether the string can be cleared

briefdescription.para: Get whether the string is QValidator::State::Acceptable, QValidator::State::Intermediate or QValidator::State::Invalid.

parameterdescription.para: Variant representation of the widget action

simplesect.para: Variant representation of the widget action

briefdescription.para: Signals that the current string changed to string.
Signals that the placeholder string changed to placeholderString.
Signals that the completer changed to completer.

detaileddescription.para: Stores a string creates widgets to interact with it
